materials.raw_text:
Calcium (Ca) - 60 g 
 Mercury (Hg) - 9.6 g 
 Silicon (Si) - 156 g

sourcing.instructions:
Calcium - Obtain from chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Mercury - Purchase from licensed chemical suppliers or specialized retailers. Note: Handle with care due to toxicity. 
 Silicon - Available from hardware stores or as silicon dioxide from chemical suppliers.

1. Measure out the specified amounts of calcium, mercury, and silicon using a precise scale.

preparation.raw_text:

 4. Mix thoroughly until a uniform consistency is achieved.
